thread.title: I enjoyed this visit at SFO Westin!
thread.title_full: I enjoyed this visit at SFO Westin! - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: I7426RCjohnr
title: I enjoyed this visit at SFO Westin!
text: The lobby and restaurant areas were A+. The rooms were very nice, clean, and comfortable. Self parking was easy to come and go by swiping your room key at the gate. Breakfast buffet ($25/pp)was well laid out with many offerings. Only about 15 min drive into downtown. I would definitely stay here again.
